extendedInfo.description: Stream and listen to your favorite SoundCloud tracks, browse or search for tracks from other artists, groups or genres, and keep finding new music to listen to on SoundCloud on your mobile phone! Follow other users, view artist profiles, share on Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr etc, and comment on tunes directly from your Android phone.Features:- Browse your tracks, groups, favorites, users- Seamless streaming and playback- Continuous Playback (Playlist feature) - SoundClouder of the Day feature (#SCOTD)- Listen to your and others Favorite tracks- Listen to tracks from other artists or users- Listen your or others "Private tracks"- Listen to live recorded DJ Sets and Mixes- Listen to recorded messages and Podcasts- Listen to Creative Commons music- Browse by Genre and Groups- Browse People you follow or following you- Follow / Unfollow other users- Search Tracks, Groups, People, Genre- Share Tracks, Share Group, Share User Profile on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Email etc etc- Follow/Unfollow other users** Top Rated Music app for SoundCloud on Amazon Android App Store. **Facebook Page: http://www.facebook.com/SoundGarageMobileTwitter Page: http://twitter.com/dirtywaterlabsTags: soundcloud, streaming music, download songs, tracks, mixes, dj, artist, recording, radio, cloud music, sharing, twitter, facebook, tumblr, on-demand musicVersion 1.9.1 (Previous)=======================- Crash in User Profile- UI Updates- Enabled Caching Mechanism for faster loading- Improved performance- Minor Bug fixesVersion 1.8 ======================= - Critical Fix: Login or Sign-in was causing a crash on some devices.- Critical Fix: Logout Issue. Re-login after logout was causing API errors.- Fix: Browse by Genre- Fix: Search by keyword was blocking UI.- Fix: UI loading optimizations.- Added: More Genres (Acoustic, Country, Folk, Comedy, Podcasts, Spoken Word etc)

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Soundcloud app didn\'t stream music on my maxtouch tablet I was gutted but this works great thanks uve made my day!! Had to reinstall for it to work properly tho but still it works!!:D

reviews.comment: Asks 2 log in with soundcloud a/c details but after I confirm all I get is a white screen. Beginning to think all s.cloud related apps are a farce. 0*

reviews.title: Better at doing soundcloud than soundcloud
reviews.comment: I love it. Its actually better at playing my own tracks on soundcloud than soundcloud is. No issues. Just flawless playback , and everything is a great size. No tiny fiddly transport controls. Im considering upgrading to pro but I dont know what the differences between this version and the pro version are. What are the differences ?
